answers.answer: I got diagnosed with it at 12 weeks ugh it's been hell. I cant stop thinking about the rest of my pregnancy I'm 25 weeks already!!! Good luck!!
Yes it socks and babies tend to be bigger because of it. That's really early for you to find out

I know thats what I said my sugars are coming out great... Im going to request to get checked again cuz I'm doing great and my weight is great and baby is doing great!!! My first baby boy was 7 15oz I can imagine my baby girl!!!

My best friend is 32 weeks and got diagnosed with it at 28 weeks. Even though she has healthy eating habits she hasn't gained a pound throughout her pregnancy. She had an ultrasound last week and her daughter is a bit underweight.  She again met her dietitian and they said she isn't doing anything wrong and just to keep up with her current diet. During that ultrasound they found an issue with blood flow through the cord, she could have been delivering tomorrow but all is looking ok for now but is being monitored closely and still probably needs to deliver a bit early

question: I am 35 weeks and recently got diagnosed with diabetes.  Did anyone deliver early over this?
title: gestational diabetes
